description: BR-31 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Vaishali district, with its headquarters located in the city of Hajipur. It is a critical administrative hub that manages vehicle registration, commercial permits, and driving licenses for one of Bihar's most populous districts. Given its strategic location across the Ganges from Patna, the office plays a vital role in regulating the transit and transport between North and South Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar
